conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquid from points A, B, C, and D.
Liquid from A flows downward and to the left, passing through the green baffle, and continues towards the left side.
Liquid from B flows downward and to the left, passing through the green baffle, and continues towards the left side.
Liquid from C flows downward and to the right, passing through the pink baffle, and continues towards the right side.
Liquid from D flows downward and to the right, passing through the pink baffle, and continues towards the right side.
The green baffle directs flow to the left.
The pink baffle directs flow to the right.
From A and B, both paths lead to the left side of the setup, directing the liquid into container E.
From C and D, both paths lead to the right side of the setup, directing the liquid into container F.
Liquid from A and B will flow into container E, and liquid from C and D will flow into container F.
